info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 6:43PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Avoyelles Parish through 745 PM CDT... At 643 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Ophelia National Wildlife Refuge, or near Bordelonville, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moreauville, Bordelonville, Brouillette, Big Bend, Lake Ophelia National Wildlife Refuge and Hamburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
